name: react-app-in-twixt-ui
description: Example React App for using Twixt UI

scripts.clear-cache-ui: git rm --cached src/TwixtUI -f || true && rm -rf .git/modules/TwixtUI || true
scripts.commit-clear: git add . && git commit -am "tech(ui): remove TwixtUI submodule" && git push origin main
scripts.ui: npm run clear-ui && npm run clear-cache-ui && npm run commit-clear && npm run init-ui
scripts.update-ui: git submodule update --remote --merge && git add src/TwixtUI && git commit -m "ui: update submodule" && git push origin main
